Ecclesiasticus *__17.11__Their eye saw: : Viz., when he gave the law on mount Sinai.
Ecclesiasticus *__17.22__Offend less: : Minue offendicula. That is, remove sins and the occasions of sins.
Ecclesiasticus *__17.25__Go to the side: : Fly from the side of Satan and sin, and join with the holy ones, that follow God and godliness.
